promptFileBrowser() → {undefined}

Opens a file browser in which you can select a file. This function should be called directly through user input and not through a websocket for example. Browsers have built in protection to prevent this, the promt will not show.

setWindowDisplayType()

Type is an enumeration where 0 is FizedSize 1 is FullWindow and 2 is FullScreen. Width and height are required with FixedSize and are ignored with the other types.
Source:
  • main.js, line 114
